main event: A shiny round object, the size of a baseball held at arm's length, was observed drifting slowly over Spokane, Washington.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for fifteen minutes., The observation was confirmed by a report stating that a weather balloon was released around the same time., The object was noted as being shiny and round., The report was generated from a civilian source., The conclusion of the report was that the observed object was a weather balloon.
